title: Hyde
description: A modern take on Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde, set in the underground party scene in a dystopian future.
quote: Sadly, all good parties must come to an end.
altHero: Vincent Chase as Hyde in a hoodie, holding up a small vial of glowing liquid
alt1: glowing liquid drops are rained on a crowd with their mouths open
alt2: an explosive hits a line of police riot shields
alt3: many gun lasers pointed at Hyde’s back
alt4: Hyde’s face glows bright red and reveals veins and arteries
